item.title: Acknowledgement of Country
item.description: We acknowledge the Wurundjeri people, Elders past and present, and their continuing connection to land and community.

item.title: Our purpose
item.description: We support and protect the long-term wellbeing of construction workers and the vitality of our industry.

item.title: Our values
item.description: Here for Members • Empower our People • Thrive Together • Anticipate & Create.

item.title: Employee Assistance Program – support anytime
item.description: Confidential counselling and support is available 24/7 for you and your immediate family via the Employee Assistance Program. Reach out if you need support.

item.title: Business Transformation Committee – Tue 9 Dec
item.description: The Business Transformation Committee meets on Tuesday 9 December to review progress on Project Elevate.

item.title: Salary Continuance Info Session – Tue 9 Dec
item.description: Join a short education session via Teams on Tuesday 16 December about the LeavePlus Income Protection policy. The session will be recorded and saved on The Hub.

item.title: End-of-Year Wellbeing Session – Thu 11 Dec
item.description: End-of-Year Wellbeing Session on Thursday 11 December with practical tips to go gently into this time, encourage self-care and share coping strategies.

item.title: Executive Committee strategy meeting – Thu 11 Dec
item.description: The Executive Committee meets on Thursday 11 December for their quarterly strategy planning meeting.

item.title: 2026 Leadership Development Workshops – leader sign up
item.description: Leaders are reminded to sign up to the 2026 Leadership Development Workshops as mentioned last week.

item.title: Christmas closure and leave over shutdown
item.description: LeavePlus offices close from 25 December and reopen on 2 January. If you have not applied for 1.5 days leave over 29–31 December, please enter your leave in ELMO.

item.title: New starter – Ekta Antil joins Project Elevate
item.description: Ekta Antil, Business Readiness Test Lead in Project Elevate, starts Monday 8th. Please help make Ekta feel welcome to LeavePlus.

item.title: Farewell – Liz Allen finishes in Employer Obligations
item.description: Liz Allen, Administrator in Employer Obligations, finishes on 8 December. We thank Liz for her contribution and wish her well in the future.

item.title: Internal move – Lisa Vella to Scheme Compliance
item.description: From 9 December, Lisa Vella moves from Senior Consultant, Employer Obligations to Senior Consultant, Scheme Compliance.

item.title: Divya Singh returns from parental leave – Wed 17 Dec
item.description: Divya Singh, Team Lead, Employer Obligations, returns from parental leave on 17 December 2025.

item.title: Town Hall Acknowledgement of Country presenters
item.description: If you are interested in presenting the Acknowledgement of Country at a Town Hall, you can volunteer. Your voice and presence help make this moment meaningful.

item.title: Charity Gift Drive – Food for Families
item.description: Our Food for Families gift drive is a simple, optional way to support people doing it tough. Give an item, donate online or cheer the effort on – every bit counts.

item.title: Elf on the Shelf – office game 1–24 Dec
item.description: From 1–24 December, the LeavePlus elf will hide around the office. Follow the daily Teams clue, find the elf, take it to Reception for a prize and a chance in the final draw.

item.title: Compliance Refresher Modules – complete in ELMO
item.description: All staff must complete the current Compliance Refresher Modules released each month in ELMO. Check Learning > My Learning and complete any outstanding modules.

item.title: Christmas leave reminder – shutdown period
item.description: A reminder about our Christmas shutdown period and how to apply for leave in ELMO. Please ensure your leave is entered and approved.

item.title: All Staff Teams channel – news and shoutouts
item.description: If you missed any updates, announcements, events or shoutouts, visit the All Staff Teams channel for all the news.

item.title: Wellness Corner – Selfish for a Reason
item.description: Being “selfish” with your self-care is generous. Like an oxygen mask on a plane, you need to look after yourself before you can help others at work and at home.

item.title: Role vacancy – Service Investigation Consultant
item.description: Service Investigation Consultant (Permanent) role available. Check the Internal Careers Page via ELMO for details and how to apply.

item.title: Role vacancy – Cyber Security Manager (max term)
item.description: Cyber Security Manager (max term) position available. Visit the Internal Careers Page via ELMO for role details and application information.

item.title: Role vacancy – Member Response Consultant
item.description: Member Response Consultant (Permanent) role available. See the Internal Careers Page via ELMO for further information and how to apply.

item.title: Role vacancy – Business Analyst (max term)
item.description: Business Analyst (max term) role available. Check the Internal Careers Page via ELMO for details and application steps.

item.title: Security passes
item.description: Forgotten pass? Collect a temp pass at Ground Floor Reception and return it by day’s end. Lost pass? Email Facilities immediately for deactivation.

item.title: L6 balcony etiquette
item.description: Enjoy the space respectfully: no rubbish, wipe tables, enter/exit quietly near meeting rooms. No smoking or vaping on the balcony.

item.title: Keep shared spaces tidy
item.description: Help keep our office looking sharp. Clear desks and common areas at the end of each day.

item.title: Nominate a teammate for a LOVE Award
item.description: Spot someone living our values? Give them a shout-out. Nominate via the intranet.

item.title: Got feedback?
item.description: We are listening. Share ideas, issues or praise so we can improve. Email yoursay@leaveplus.com.au.

item.title: Internal careers
item.description: Ready for your next step? Explore internal opportunities and grow your career here. See ELMO for current roles.

item.title: Town Hall – Acknowledgement of Country
item.description: Interested in presenting the Acknowledgement at a future Town Hall? Submit an expression of interest.

item.title: Book Club
item.description: Love a good read? Join the LeavePlus Book Club. Open to everyone. Contact Avi Mandal for details.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Artemis Rohanian
item.description: Recognised for exceptional collaboration and positive change. A true change champion who builds connections and drives progress.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Lisa Bihari
item.description: Created 15 Coverage Hub profiles with high quality and speed, adopting governance and sharing knowledge to help smash PI5 goals.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Andrew Mackenzie
item.description: Supported Elevate squads, briefed CFMEU delegates, connected industry stakeholders for testing, and kept member experience front of mind.

item.title: LOVE Award Winner – Keely Lock
item.description: Wrote and rolled out a Returns training plan; engaging and easy to follow, with docs provided and hands-on support during practice.

item.title: LOVE Award People’s Choice – Helen Hawkins
item.description: Celebrated for making onboarding and training seamless, fun and interactive, helping new starters consolidate knowledge.

item.title: LOVE Awards – Nominate a Colleague
item.description: Seen someone living our values? Nominate them for a LeavePlus LOVE award.
